author: joacovitale
title: Lossless Donation DEFI protocol
description: We help NGO's raise funds using Lossless Donations where users can donate interest generated while having free availability of their tokens
solution: Wooy is the first Lossless Donation DEFI protocol, where user can win incredible experiences and prizes while helping NGOs
experience: We did an MVP in Argentina with +3k organic users, 8 celebrities and a partnership with the Red Cross to help them fight Covid 19.
